channel.title: EasyRSC Bug?
channel.description:
i have found that when you login into a EasyRsc server in the private tab it tells you all your friends have loged out.
why would it do this???? thats not supposed to happen unless they login and then logout while your loged in.
in player.java i found this.
[code]sender.sendMessage(" "); // ROFL at this, its to stop the stupid friends list saying xx logged out when someone logs in, ill fix it up later sender.sendMessage(" "); sender.sendMessage(" ");[/code]
anyone know how to fix this?

item.title: EasyRSC Bug?
item.dc:creator: @Iron_Maiden1 Iron Maiden
item.description:
@Iron_Maiden1 wrote:

to k09

im not running any server at all…

no point in trying to when there are already good servers out there (rsca the only one which will last), plus jagex planning to re-release rsc. i just quit rscdevil since it failed and dont plan on playing any other private server

im just using easyrsc cuz its simpler as a way to have some fun doing java and trying to help people who know less then me, and maybe learning a thing or 2

Read full topic

item.title: EasyRSC Bug?
item.dc:creator: @KO9 KO9
item.description:
@KO9 wrote:

@Iron Maiden

No idea, but without disrespect to xEnt, I would not recommend running EasyRSC for a server.

Read full topic

item.title: EasyRSC Bug?
item.dc:creator: @Iron_Maiden1 Iron Maiden
item.description:
@Iron_Maiden1 wrote:

so only xent knows how to fix this?

another bug i have found is sometimes the server would create a new account by itself just without the first letter.

like if im using the account “iron_maiden” sometimes it would create the account “ron_maiden”

Read full topic

item.title: EasyRSC Bug?
item.dc:creator: @yong_min yong min
item.description:
@yong_min wrote:

adu:

Its an “easy fix” that xent put into the source so it wouldn’t say blablabla logged out when you login.

Nobody tampered the version lol ^^

Read full topic
